mapper.insert: insert into commodity_catalog( supplier_unique_name , name, is_create_empty_content , is_ignore_approve, is_stop_before_approve , is_auto_activate , is_allow_multi_supplier_cif , level) values( #{supplier.uniqueName} , #{name }, #{isCreateEmptyContent }, #{isIgnoreApprove} , #{isStopBeforeApprove} , #{isAutoActivate} , #{isAllowMultiSupplierCIF}, #{level} )
